unnormalised: Hey guys, training hard? I'm curious, what regimen do you follow? My friend, Rohan from IIT Delhi, swears by interval training for his marathon prep. He runs 40 km weekly! Dr. Sharma recommended it, apparently burns more calories. He's also invested in a new gym membership with 500 sq ft area. Cost him Rs. 10,000. Is it effective? Please share your tips!
normalised: Hey guys, training hard? I'm curious, what regimen do you follow? My friend, Rohan from I I T Delhi, swears by interval training for his marathon prep. He runs forty kilometer weekly! Doctor Sharma recommended it, apparently burns more calories. He's also invested in a new gym membership with five hundred square feet area. Cost him rupee ten thousand. Is it effective? Please share your tips!
